description: Acyclic orientations of Hamming graph (K_n) x (K_n).
comments: This number is equivalent to the number of plans (i.e. structural solutions) of the open shop problem with n jobs and n machines - see problems in scheduling theory.
references: H. Braesel, M. Harborth, T. Tautenhahn and P. Willenius, On the set of solutions of the open shop problem, Ann. Oper. Res. 92 (1999) 241-263
M. Harborth, Structural analysis of shop scheduling problems, PhD thesis, Otto-von-Guericke-Univ. Magdeburg, GCA-Verlag, 1999 (in German)
author: Martin Harborth (Martin.Harborth(AT)vt.siemens.de)
